name: Shooter10
description: Basic SinglePlayer Shooting Game (its for testing my 1 week programming skills so i will be happy with FeedBack), its normal 2D shooting game and you will get hearts for your play so if you passed 10 waves you will win and get first heart if you passed 10 waves and your health was at its max (10) you will get different heart and if you passed 10 waves without taking hit you will get different heart.
